MS MCQs

    Introduction to test automation in Business Central

    »

    1. Which Cmdlet in the NavContainerHelper can you use to install the Test Toolkit?

      Import-TestToolkitToBCContainer

      Install-TestToolkitToContainer

      Import-TestToolkitToContainer

      Install-TestToolkitToBCContainer


    2. Which attribute on a test method is used to roll back changes after test execution?

      TestIsolation

      TransactionModel

      TestModel

      TransactionIsolation


    3. Which of the following statements is valid for executing an action on a page? MyTestPage is a variable of type TestPage.

      MyTestPage.Invoke(MyAction)

      MyTestPage.MyAction.Invoke()

      TestPage.Invoke(MyTestPage.MyAction)

      MyTestPage.MyAction.InvokeAction()
